b'3-tsu no Hanashi': b'Three Tales was one of the first domestic anime ever televised. It comprised of three stories: "The Third Plate" (\xe7\xac\xac\xe4\xb8\x89\xe3\x81\xae\xe7\x9a\xbf) by Hirosuke Hamada, "Oppel and the Elephant" (\xe3\x82\xaa\xe3\x83\x83\xe3\x83\x9a\xe3\x83\xab\xe3\x81\xa8\xe8\xb1\xa1) by Kenji Miyazawa, and "Sleepy Town" (\xe7\x9c\xa0\xe3\x81\x84\xe7\x94\xba) by Mimei Ogawa.'
